@varunchadha2583 Hi! To be able to use your Wizz Credits 1. you need to log in to your account 2. the account holder has to be the first passenger all times 3. there can be a total of 6 passengers only 4. there can't be any third party services included. Thank you

domain.name: Business Taxonomy
domain.description: Categories within Brand Verticals that narrow down the scope of Brands

entity.name: Publisher & News Business
entity.description: Brands, companies, advertisers and every non-person handle with the profit intent related to  marketing and advertiser agencies, publishers of magazines, newspapers, blogs, books

domain.name: Brand Vertical
domain.description: Top level entities that describe a Brands industry

domain.name: Entities [Entity Service]
domain.description: Entity Service top level domain, every item that is in Entity Service should be in this domain
